meanings.definition: Characterized by a pleasing rhythm or harmony.
meanings.sent1: The eurhythmic dance performance captivated the audience with its graceful movements.
meanings.sent2: The music had an eurhythmic quality that made it easy to dance to.
meanings.sent3: The eurhythmic flow of the river was like a soothing lullaby to the ears.
meanings.sent4: Her eurhythmic voice carried through the room, calming everyone who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmic pattern of the leaves rustling in the wind was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The art of interpreting music through bodily movements.
meanings.sent1: She studied eurhythmic to express the music through her dance.
meanings.sent2: The eurhythmic performance at the concert added a visual element to the music.
meanings.sent3: The eurhythmic class was a fun way to learn about music and movement.
meanings.sent4: His eurhythmic interpretation of the song brought a new dimension to the music.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmic movements of the dancers perfectly matched the rhythm of the music.
